title: Double Title Issue in Video Notes
details:
ISSUE: Double titles appearing in generated video notes.

ROOT CAUSE: The final_summary_prompt.md template at src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Prompts/final_summary_prompt.md contained "# {{title}}" which generated a title heading. Even after setting includeNoteTypeTitle: false in VideoNoteProcessor.cs, the AI template was still producing the title heading.

DISCOVERY: There were two different final_summary_prompt.md files:
1. prompts/final_summary_prompt.md (without # {{title}}) 
2. src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Prompts/final_summary_prompt.md (with # {{title}})

The executable was using the Core project's version which had the duplicate title.

FLOW THAT CAUSED THE ISSUE:
1. VideoNoteProcessor.GenerateVideoNoteAsync calls GenerateAiSummaryAsync with final_summary_prompt
2. AI processes template with # {{title}} and returns content with title heading
3. Even with includeNoteTypeTitle: false, the AI-generated content already contained the title
4. Result: Title heading from AI template appeared in final markdown

SOLUTION APPLIED:
1. Changed includeNoteTypeTitle from true to false in VideoNoteProcessor.cs line 1079 (prevents DocumentNoteProcessorBase from adding title)
2. Removed "# {{title}}" from src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Prompts/final_summary_prompt.md template (prevents AI from generating title heading)

FILES MODIFIED:
- src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Tools/VideoProcessing/VideoNoteProcessor.cs (line 1079 - includeNoteTypeTitle: false)
- src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Prompts/final_summary_prompt.md (removed # {{title}} line)

FINAL STATUS: FIXED - Both sources of duplicate titles eliminated. Executable rebuilt with timestamp 10:08:59 AM on 6/15/2025. Double title issue should now be resolved.
